name: COVID-19 Virus Crossing - WHO can help? (病毒之友會)
name_original: COVID-19 Virus Crossing - WHO can help? (病毒之友會)
description:
Can WHO help?

Virus Crossing is a parkour game, wear a mask and wash your hands. This is a parkour game that improves skills and avoids COVID-19.

這是一款跑酷遊戲，請帶上口罩並經常洗手。

Does everyone like this theme?
Can you leave a message here?
